```{r,echo=F,warning=F}
fraction = runif(1,0.02,0.98)
total = 2^(runif(1,1,10))
part = fraction*total

total = signif(total,3)
part = signif(part,3)
fraction = signif(part/total,3)

```

Question
========

`r part` is what percent of `r total`? 


Solution
========

Use the English-to-Math translation table.

| English | Math |
|:---:|:---:|
| is | = |
| what | $x$ |
| percent | $\frac{1}{100}$ or $\%$ |
| of | $\cdot$ |

Write the statement in algebraic notation.
$$`r part`~=~ x \frac{1}{100} \cdot `r total`$$
